entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
